Description: On I-95 at mile marker 59.3 in the County of Chesterfield, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 South at mile marker 16 in the County of Greensville, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On Rt. 683 in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Kelso Rd; Rt. 6120N/S (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 230.8 in the County of James City, near Croaker Road, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
